page.title: 20Watching Television.
page.content: One of the most popular things we do out of school in our own time is to watch television.Everybody watches it at some time every day. About half the people in the school watch breakfast television before coming to school. The most popular programme at the moment is "Dogtanian" a cartoon version of Dumas' "Three Muskateers" starring dogs! Also popular are the American soap operas with "Dallas" the story of rich oil barons from Texas still the most popular,though supposedly made for adult viewing. Cartoons of almost any sort always feature among the most watched of the progammes and there are some on every day on breakfast television and during childrens television at teatime.
